thread.title: Leicestershire Rich List live: The 50 wealthiest people in the county for 2017 - Leicester Mercury

author: Tom Pegden
title: Leicestershire Rich List live: The 50 wealthiest people in the county for 2017 - Leicester Mercury
text:
Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now 
The Leicestershire Rich List is the Leicester Mercury's guide to the fortunes of the county's wealthiest people. 
For several years the research has been compiled annually and the details published. 
Scroll down to follow the countdown live from 11am on Tuesday. 
"Forget all the talk of the Brexit impact or economic uncertainty," he added. 
"If you’re at the top of the wealth pile things are going pretty well. 
"The richest people in Leicestershire have increased their combined fortunes by more than £1.5 billion according to the 2017 Leicestershire and Rutland Rich List." Read More
